name: Precleanse Cleansing Oil
about: What it is:A thoroughly cleansing oil that melts away waterproof makeup, SPF, debris, and oil without clogging pores or stripping your skinu2019s natural oils..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Pores, Redness, and Acne and Blemishes.Formulation:Lightweight Oil.Highlighted Ingredients:- Vitamin E and Rice Bran Extract: Antioxidant-rich ingredients that moisturize, smooth, and soften skin..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:An iconic formula from the brand known for the double cleanse, the Precleanse Cleansing Oil is a blend of lightweight plant-based oils that melt away layers of sebum (oil), SPF, waterproof makeup, and other impurities that build up on skin throughout the day. Gentle enough for the eyes, this formula will even remove eyelash glue.
ingredients: -Vitamin E: Nourishes and protects skin from damage. .-Rice Bran: Gently exfoliates. .-Rosemary: Protects skin from damage. ..Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, PEG-40 Sorbitan Peroleate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Oil, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus Oil, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Extract, Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Aleurites Moluccana Seed Oil, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Citral, Limonene, Linalool.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Dispense into dry hands..-Massage over dry face and eyes to dissolve surface oil, SPF, makeup, and debris. .-Concentrate on areas of congestion or stubborn debris..-Wet hands and continue massaging to create a light, milky emulsion..-Rinse with lukewarm water and follow with any Dermalogica cleanser (sold separately).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this stuff. Buying for the 3rd time because it is so awesome. I put it on my dry skin and massage it in circles all over my face right before I shower and follow it up with the dermalogica face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not as thick as I thought. Turns into kind of a milky thin watery texture, and also it has a strong herbal scent which I really dislike. I wish it just stayed oily and clear, and had no scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many cleansing oils and balms and this one is just ok . It does not completely do the job of removing all make up and it does leave a filmy residue on the face . I prefer Elemis cleansing balm or Clinique

reviews.review_title: I love it, and I have super sensitive skin!! :)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product helps sooo much with removing my mascara!!! On a daily basis I use the sky high WATERPROOF mascara with some setting powder mixed in.. (super hard to get off but such a good combo I recommend it) and this precleanse oil gets it off so fast!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as part of a set. Its not bad but it really isnu2019t anything special as far as oil cleansers and cleansing balms are concerned. Certainly not worth $50 in my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far my favourite oil cleanser, you can actually feel it removing debris from your face. Just use it sparingly as it is a strong oil cleanser. 2-3x a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gets the job done, but does leave a sort of residue on my face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells AWFUL- I felt like I was bathing my face in my grandmothers Potpourri- it did not cleanse my mascara (it was not waterproof) and simply has no business being priced the way it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best product, it even removes waterproof mascaras and best of all, it doesn't irritate the eyes.

reviews.review_title: Oil pulling to get rid of blackheads
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gets rid of blackheads! I use this for oil pulling to get rid of blackheads and sebaceous filaments on my nose. First, I put a warm washcloth over my face for a few minutes to open up my pores. Then I gently massage the product into my t-zone for about 5 minutes, focusing on my nose as thatu2019s where I get a lot of blackheads. Then I rinse it off, cleanse, and finish with a BHA toner to tighten up my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At the end of the day, I want my cleansing oil to easily melt my sun screen and makeup. To be fair, this oil did a good job of taking off my layers of tinted moisturizer, bronzer, blush, powder, concealer, eyeshadow, etc. It left my skin feeling soft and not too dry. However it barely took off any of my Urban decay waterproof perversion mascara. I'm extremely disappointed. The product also made my eyes sting, possibly from the strong fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the mini every day since June at my facialist's recommendation.  A little goes a long way if you use it correctly, a few drops in my palm and I rub it around my face until all my makeup has loosened and the oil emulsifies, then wash with a gentle cleanser and rinse. My skin glows, has less congestion and is clear. I will purchase the full size next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using a pre-cleansing oil. I purchased the mini kit to try it out and I am blown away by the results! My skin has a nice glow to it after only one use of the kit. I have combination skin prone to acne etc. DEFINITELY investing in the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to get an oil cleanser just to add to my routine because a lot of people recommend double cleansing, especially with an oil cleanser. So I looked at many and chose this one. Not my best decision. I've used it more than a couple of times now and I felt no difference in my skin, if anything my face felt dry and dirtier??? It doesn't feel like a regular oil either, you have to use a lot to feel something. And the bottle is SO SO small (which is another issue on how much you use, you'll use it all by the end of the week), it's ridiculous. $17 for a 1oz that's the size of my pinkie?! No thank you. Don't waste your money please, get another oil cleanser and don't waste your time or money on this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily, acne-prone skin and don't wear makeup. I purchased this because I was interested in adding an oil cleanser to my skincare routine. I used it every evening for a few weeks as the first step of my routine. I applied a few drops to dry skin and massaged it in. Then I added water and continued massaging, finally rinsing it off and following with a gel cleanser. I bought the mini which is a nice tester size, I got a few weeks out of half the bottle before I stopped using it.   I thought it was okay. It cleanses well without drying, but I find my gel cleanser works perfectly on its own and this product doesn't add anything to my cleansing step. It also has a strong citrusy-floral scent which I don't like. If you're avoiding strong fragrances, avoid this item. I think we should leave the fragrance to incense, perfume, etc. I won't be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have always been weary of oil cleansers because I struggle with adult acne but I kept hearing people rave about them and how you should use them to remove makeup and then follow up with another cleanser, so I decided to give this a try since it has so many great reviews. I do like the smell of it, and it feels good on my face, however it does not remove mascara, which is annoying. Also, my acne seems to have gotten worse since starting to use this over a month ago. Disappointing as I know Dermalogica is a trusted brand and I really wanted to like this :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this oil precleanse when I double cleanse on make up days. Itu2019s very gentle, it doesnu2019t break my skin out and it takes all of my make up. I use it on dry skin then get my hands wet AFTER I rubbed it on dry skin, use my wet hands to emulsify it and rinse. Then I go on with my second wash and regimen. The only thing that I do not like is the smell, but itu2019s not enough to make me not love this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product works great. It smoothed my skin and helped control my occasional breakouts. However, the price is unsustainable and Iu2019ve had to switch to a new precleanser because I canu2019t afford it anymore

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It works okay but to be honest itu2019s too expensive for the amount of product you get:(

reviews.review_title: Do not try this product for acne!!!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you have acne prone skin and are looking for an oil cleanser take this as a sign to PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE NOT TRY THIS. I started using this product and it immediately broke me out, I kept up the use for a month thinking my skin needed to adjust and it has DESTROYED my skin. Before I had occasional cystic breakout on my T zone and the product did not help with this. Instead I am left with closed comedones all over my chin and T zone that are turning into painful inflamed breakouts. Unless you want to spend months clearing your skin and purging with the use of actives this product is not worthwhile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! My allergy meds are drying my skin out so this oil based precleanser is helping to manage the dryness and avoid ashiness. Also helps to remove makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have horribly dry skin, so when I tell you Iu2019ve tried every micellar water, cleaning balm, oil, wipe, YOU NAME IT under the sun and NOTHING comes close to this?! It removes everything without the dryness! 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I normally wake up in the morning with my skin still feeling icky even when I've washed my face the night before. I wake up now with my skin still smooth. Excellent!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo/sensitive skin, I loved the fact that it cleansed my face very well but I realized after the 3rd use that my skin started looking rough and it looked like I was having a allergic reaction to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My holy grail! I've been using this for about a year now and it is amazing! I used to use acne treatments in my routine, and I haven't needed them at all now. It does a great job removing makeup and sunscreen, is a life saver for dry skin after swimming, and leaves your skin clean, refreshed, and glowing. The product itself smells good and feels lovely. It's replaced 2 of my old must haves! I am obsessed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this every night for about a month and my skin has never looked better!!  I experience hormonal acne and this has helped tremendously!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It wasnu2019t very effective at removing eye makeup.  Even if it was better at removing eye makeup, I couldnu2019t get past the smell of the product (too herby or woodsy).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: At first I was scared to try it because I have sensitive skin but I tried it out and it didnu2019t break me out I saw my blackheads visibly come off! It was fascinating to see lol!  Iu2019ve had it for about a month so far so good.

reviews.review_title: So hard to remove. Doesnu2019t work or regular mascara
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, notSure skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and a though it removed some of my make up, it didnu2019t remove my mascara that wasnu2019t the waterproof type. Hard to get the white milky oil off your face after rinsing it with water.  so annoying that you end up using more product for your face soap to get it off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fairly sensitive oily/combo skin and after using this product I broke out like crazy all over my face, it looked like an allergic reaction. Wouldnu2019t recommend for sensitive skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t typically write reviews but I think I should share my experience as well. I was scared to try this cleanser when I read some of the reviews but like others it irritated my skin and I have small breakouts on my face now. I had clear skin before using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love dermalogica but Iu2019ll pass on this.. you need to use quite a bit to actually get some makeup off, half of it ends up running down your arms. Def not worth the $70

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Remove all make up effortlessly for my sensitive and prone to acne skin ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have NEVER EVER EVER EVER broken out in a long time. Yes it melts makeup away nicely but you need like 3 pumps and with 3 pumps you already used like 20% of the product. Also it broke me out as a dry skin girlie. I canu2019t imagine what it would do to oily skin people.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had put off oil cleansing for such a long time. Not really sure why. I have issues with sebaceous filaments on my nose and my chin, particularly right under my lower lip. The photos that I share here are after one use, and now I'm hooked on double cleansing! Not only is there a huge difference in the way that my skin looks, but it also feels more smooth and clean. This oil is nice and light, smells wonderful, and left my skin feeling way more soft and hydrated then it typically feels after I use my everyday water cleanser (which is still great!) The pump works great and the bottle is a nice size. I'm not a giant fan of the price, but I can't complain too much based on the results. I'm so glad to have found this and I wish I would have started sooner.  (Also just adding this disclaimer that my review is NOT incentivized, I left a review on another product that I purchased and it was marked as incentivized even though I didn't click the box. I'm always searching for non-incentivized AND verified purchases, so just wanted to share that.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin and was hesitant to try and oil based cleanser but this hasn't broken me out at all and has been the perfect addition to my routine for a precleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you have sensitive skin, SPARE YOURSELF, and DO NOT USE! :(  I was suggested this by an employee as I was searching for an oil cleanser that was good for oily, sensitive, acne prone skin. I have used Farmacy Green Clean forever and I regret SO MUCH trying this product - I am having the worst face experience of my life (and Iu2019m 31!). *cue all the anxiety and tears*  I tried this product twice and it has affected my vision, my face is burning and red, it is PAINFUL and honestly scary! Iu2019ve had to go to the doctor and douse my face in hydrocortisone, plus pretty much not use anything but the most basic skincare. It sucks!  I was really hopeful but as soon as I can see clearly again and my face doesnu2019t burn from leaving my cave, I will be returning. :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It smells like lemon furniture cleaner. And it wonu2019t dissolve my Lancu00f4me waterproof mascara where other oils/balms will. Itu2019s a hard no from me.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to be skeptical of this brand and the products they offered since most of the reviews were all positive. I've been using Tatcha for quite a few years, but nothing compares to Dermalogica! I have acne prone, VERY sensitive skin, and many products have a fragrance that irritates my skin. From the first pump, the wonderful light mandarin smell brings you joy, while the product works its magic. I highly recommend and will be purchasing from now on!!! It helped remove my makeup, reduce my redness, and breakouts

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleansing oil, when rubbed onto the skin for at least a minute, is really good at loosening up any dead skin and makeup on the skin's surface. The only con is it has a strong smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It does what it saysu2014-takes off makeup and even pesky mascara while leaving skin soft.  A must for a two-step cleaning routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A great oil that doesnu2019t break me out. It works pretty well and also can remove makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product DESTROYED my skin - ruined my skin barrier and caused an allergic reaction, triggered cystic acne and texture issues that I am still struggling with now 5 months later

reviews.review_title: My favorite go to makeup remover
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the smaller size to try and i absolutely loved it that i purchased the 150ml. Two pumps removes my entire face/eye makeup, leaving no residue or foggy eyes. Other brands can leave a horrible residue
J'aime beaucoup les huiles nettoyantes et celle-ci est vraiment parfaite, la sensation sur la peau est agru00e9able!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i love this cleansing oil, but the packaging is trash.  too much product loss for such an expensive oil cleanseru2026i cannot afford to lose the amount of product i have.  this really sucks because the product is genuinely amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this for taking off makeup!! my skin feels so much more hydrated afterwards. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Made me fall in love with double cleansing!!! My skin feels so clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this a while ago and just started using it recently. This is awesome! Use a couple of pumps, add water and rub all over the face, as someone else said, it really feels or seems like it eats away/melts makeup. Also it smells like lemon zest. This is great before cleansing. I was already pre cleansing but with an oil base Garnier toner, this is much better, I was really excited when I saw this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser for double cleansing - doesnu2019t break me out and removes all makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The second I added this oil cleanser to my nightly routine I broke out. I rarely get bad pimples none the less break out but after using the cleanser my skin is the worse it has looked in years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I read online about oil cleansers helping clear up sebaceous filaments so I thought Iu2019d give this one a go. I made sure to follow this up with a regular, water based cleanser that Iu2019ve been using successfully for years. While it did an amazing job with cleaning out sebaceous filaments on my nose (it was a noticeable improvement even after 1 use), this pre-cleanse made me break out terribly all over the rest of my face! I havenu2019t had forehead acne in 10 years, but now Iu2019m dealing with a breakout that makes me look and feel like a teenager again. It is slow to heal, too- Iu2019m really hoping this hasnu2019t completely messed my skin up for long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried this product multiple times I absolutely love love dermologica but I do not like this product. I break out each and every time I am 46 and I never break out I repeatedly tried this product different times of the year and it's a no.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far the best cleansing oil. Purchased with my own money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ok but not worth the money. Bought this thinking it would easily remove my non-waterproof mascara, given the product description says it can remove waterproof. Doesn't work. makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted so badly to love this but it broke me out SO badly. I have adult hormonal acne and my skin was actually doing pretty well before I bought this product and 3 months later Iu2019m still dealing with the mess it made of my skin. Itu2019s effective at removing makeup and I can see why it would be great for someone without acne problems but I wish Iu2019d never tried it.

reviews.review_title: Ok, will not remove waterproof mascara
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good product though I don't feel it is worth the money. It definitely had trouble with my makeup. It says it will remove stubborn mascara but I always needed to come back through with a round of makeup remover. It was ok but would not repurchase.

reviews.review_title: My go to before I wash
reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My go to every morning and afternoon before I wash my face. I love the smell and the feel that it gives my oily sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked it! A decent sample size for the prize. Gets my eye makeup off and hasnu2019t broken me out and Iu2019ve used it everyday since i bought it. Really smoothed out my nose pores!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Donu2019t hesitate to purchase this oil cleaner. Itu2019s top tier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this Dermatologica mini cleansing oil , as well as the Dermatologica mini exfoliator to try it due to positive reviews, and I must say that I was not disappointed. Tried it for the first time and my skin felt so soft and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After searching desperately for something that matches the original clinique take the day off balm I gave this a try but unfortunately it really exasperates my sensitive and dry eye symptoms. Not sure if it actually does but it feels like thereu2019s some type of citrusy ingredient that should make it nowhere near your eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin but use tret so it gets irritated easily- most foaming cleansers burn. This oil takes all my makeup off but doesnu2019t hurt, I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this .. However this is not for acne prone skin. Although it says it's safe for all skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Do not buy if you have acne prone skin!!!! This broke me out all over my chin and lower cheek and it was almost all little bumps. DO NOT recommend and I usually love this brand.

reviews.review_title: THEE BEST !! And Iu2019ve tried them ALL.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This pre-cleanse oil is light, refreshing and does what it is designed to do.  I struggle with getting all my waterproof mascara off as well as my tinted moisturizer and setting powder.  No makeup left when I use this product !  I love it and will keep going back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the solid balms from farmacy and drunk elephant for the last couple of years. I think this is better. Removes makeup as well as the others, but doesnu2019t require as much work to get the actual cleanser off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried them allu2014 micellar waters, balms and makeup wipes. Nothing has came near to this perfect oil removing cleanser. The best on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Before this product I had good skin with a few breakouts caused by hormonal changes. After this product I am suffering from the worst skin of my life! Stopped using it weeks ago and still working on fixing my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love using this product and I feel that it works great also as a make up remover. Unfortunately, the packaging is a huge issue IMO. Definitely will have product loss if you even knock over the bottle and not travel proof at all ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The top is so leaky. So much product leaks out after one use leaving the bottle oily and considering the price it seems like wasting money. Other than that the product works for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This dried out my under eyes and eyelids so bad that they almost felt burnt the next day. I wanted to like it but just not the right cleansing oil for me.
